name: ATOMIC MACHINES
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers about manufacturing innovations including as part of the FY 2025 National Defense Authorization Act.
Educate policymakers about manufacturing innovations, including as part of the H.R. 8070, the FY 2025 National Defense Authorization Act, and programs under the CHIPS and Science Act (P.L. 117-167).
